name: 10MINUTES (itch)
description:
A project that I could not finish due to personal reasons.

You were supposed to beat a boss that follows you around by exploring a small world, collecting weapons, gadgets with a time-travelling mechanic (you have a checkpoint that you can carry around with you.)

Gameplay:

"Left click "to use your weapon.

"Space" to Jump 'if you got the boots.)"C "to place your checkpoint (you can collect it by slashing it or if the boss touches it)
"Maj "to use your weapons ability (if it has one.)

(I published it in a hurry so I forgot to set it up to the title screen first sorry)


Thanks to MusicForTheIll For the music if you're interested in his music please check him out: https://soundcloud.com/mfti
